page.title: 16Services in Slyne-with-Hest
page.content: There are a small range of services offered in Slyne-with-Hest.Around the old village of Slyne there is a Post Office-Newsagents,a general grocery shop,and a fruit and vegetable store. The Cross Keys pub in Slyne dates back to 1727,with the more recent Slyne Lodge Motel close by.At Hest Bank there are more shops and services.These include a Bank,a Post Office,a general grocery shop,a fruit and vegetable shop,a cafe,a butchers,a fabric shop, a sweet shop-cafe,and a pub,The Hest Bank Hotel.The only garage in Slyne-with-Hest providing petrol and servicing is Webb's Garage on the road to Lancaster.There is a petrol station on the main road between Morecambe and Carnforth.At Prince's Cresent at the edge of Morecambe there is a busy shopping area providing a wide range of services.
